text: Rocky II is the sequel to Rocky (1976) starring Sylvester Stallone (who also directed). It also stars Carl Weathers, Talia Shire, Burgess Meredith, Burt Young, Tony Burton, Joe Spinell and its distributed by United Artists. The film is followed up by Rocky III (1982). ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 drama movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Rocky movies Category:Screenplays by Sylvester Stallone Category:Movies directed by Sylvester Stallone
title: Rocky II
